casebody.data:
Thomas I. ROBINSON Jr. & Inge G. Thulin, Respondents
v.
James A. GORDON & Jag Associates "1", LLC, Petitioner Petition of: James A. Gordon No. 577 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 14, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 14th day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
